Asteroid

public Asteroid(double xPos,
                double yPos,
                double anAngle,
                int aSize,
                int frameWidth,
                int frameHeight)
Constructs a new asteroid.

Parameters:
xPos - the x position
yPos - the y position
angle - the angle of the asteroid
aSize - the size of the asteroid, size can be 1 (small), 2 (medium), or 3 (large).
frameWidth - the width of the frame
frameHeight - the height of the frame
